reviewText: Excellent movie. Really good message and great for the whole family.
Absolutely the worst movie I have never made it through, how it got 4 stars is beyond me. I should have just thrown my money out the window, seriously this is awful.
We need more people like Hood to rise up and make a difference in lives.  Great movie and message!!!
Loved this movie.  One of the best version of the story I have seen.
Great modern day telling of a classic story.
Loved it!  Great story.  Amazing acting!  Solid flick!
Kept waiting for it to get better...and it didn't.
A pipe dream, but a very good pipe dream
Nice potential, but poor quality acting, really bad sound work, and weak editing made it hard to swallow.

When RJ ( Matt Singletary) returns from Afghanistan to south Chicago he discovers the neighborhood is as bad as when he escaped from it. Armed with a new philosophy and new special ops tactics he becomes a youth mentor by day and a vigilante by night. He takes it upon himself to clean up the streets going after the top dog.

Matt Singletary comes across like Vin Diesel with soul. The production incorporates a faith based message which accounts for the many rave reviews. However as an action film, it lacks scenes that show action. The opening Afghanistan scene was horrible. What was with his conflict with his superior that never circled back into the film? The violence is toned down to where we don't see most of the blows, just guys falling over. The sound quality wasn't great which was noticeable on the inside shots, especially the restaurant scene.

If you are looking for an action film, keep going. If you want a pseudo-action faith based film with no swearing, sex, or nudity, and quality is not an issue, this is it.
Awesome Film!!! Very Inspiring and great acting!
